00273 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00274 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& b, bool
00275     force_thread_safety)
00276 {
00277     if (Nothrow) {
00278         try {
00279             data = b.data;
00280             if (!data.is_nan()) {
00281                 if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false)
00282                     data.make_unique();
00283             }
00284         } catch (std::exception&) {
00285             data.make_nan();
00286         }
00287     } else {
00288         data = b.data;
00289         if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00290     }
00291 }
00292 
00294 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00295 template <typename charT>
00296 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const charT *str, size_t base) {
00297     if (Nothrow) {
00298         try {
00299             std::basic_string<charT> tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
00300             if (str[0] == tnan[0] && std::basic_string<charT>(str) == tnan) {
00301                 data.make_nan();
00302             } else {
00303                 data.from_string(str, base);
00304             }
00305         } catch (std::exception&) {
00306             data.make_nan();
00307         }
00308     } else {
00309         data.from_string(str, base);
00310     }
00311 }
00312 
00341 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00342 template <typename charT>
00343 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const charT *str, charT **endptr, size_t
00344     base)
00345 {
00346     if (Nothrow) {
00347         try {
00348             std::basic_string<charT> tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
00349             if (str[0] == tnan[0]) {
00350                 std::basic_string<charT> s(str);
00351                 if (s.substr(0, tnan.length()) == tnan) {
00352                     data.make_nan();
00353                     *endptr = str + tnan.length();
00354                     return;
00355                 }
00356             }
00357             data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00358         } catch (std::exception&) {
00359             data.make_nan();
00360         }
00361     } else {
00362         data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00363     }
00364 }
00365 
00390 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00391 template <typename charT>
00392 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const std::basic_string<charT>& str, size_t
00393     base)
00394 {
00395     if (Nothrow) {
00396         try {
00397             if (str == detail::nan_text<charT>()) data.make_nan();
00398             else data.from_string(str, base);
00399         } catch (std::exception&) {
00400             data.make_nan();
00401         }
00402     } else {
00403         data.from_string(str, base);
00404     }
00405 }

00428 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00429 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, bitsize_t bits) {
00430     if (Nothrow) {
00431         try {
00432             data.from_binary(b, bits);
00433         } catch (std::exception&) {
00434             data.make_nan();
00435         }
00436     } else {
00437         data.from_binary(b, bits);
00438     }
00439 }

00453 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00454 BOOST_XINT_OTHER_TPL
00455 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_OTHER_TYPE& b, bool
00456     force_thread_safety)
00457 {
00458     if (Nothrow) {
00459         try {
00460             if (b.is_nan()) {
00461                 data.make_nan();
00462             } else {
00463                 data = b._data();
00464                 if (!data.is_nan() && force_thread_safety && Threadsafe ==
00465                     false) data.make_unique();
00466             }
00467         } catch (std::exception&) {
00468             data.make_nan();
00469         }
00470     } else {
00471         if (b._data().is_nan()) throw exceptions::not_a_number();
00472         data = b._data();
00473         if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00474     }
00475 }

00489 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00490 template <typename Type> BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const Type n,
00491     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*)
00492 {
00493     if (Nothrow) {
00494         try {
00495             if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00496             else data.set_unsigned(n);
00497         } catch (std::exception&) {
00498             data.make_nan();
00499         }
00500     } else {
00501         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00502         else data.set_unsigned(n);
00503     }
00504 }

00506 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00507 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::
00508     operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00509 {
00510     if (Nothrow) {
00511         if (c._data().is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00512         else {
00513             try {
00514                 data = c.data;
00515                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00516             } catch (std::exception&) {
00517                 data.make_nan();
00518             }
00519         }
00520     } else {
00521         data = c.data;
00522         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00523     }
00524     return *this;
00525 }

00535 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00536 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator~() const {
00537     if (Nothrow) {
00538         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00539         try {
00540             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(~data);
00541             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00542             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00543         } catch (std::exception&) {
00544             return nan();
00545         }
00546     } else {
00547         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(~data);
00548         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00549         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00550     }
00551 }

00559 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00560 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator-() const {
00561     if (Nothrow) {
00562         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00563         try {
00564             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(*this);
00565             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00566             r.data = -r.data;
00567             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00568         } catch (std::exception&) {
00569             return nan();
00570         }
00571     } else {
00572         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(*this);
00573         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00574         r.data = -r.data;
00575         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00576     }
00577 }

00581 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator+=(const
00582     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE b)
00583 {
00584     if (Nothrow) {
00585         if (b.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00586         if (!is_nan()) {
00587             try {
00588                 data += b.data;
00589                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00590             } catch (std::exception&) {
00591                 data.make_nan();
00592             }
00593         }
00594     } else {
00595         data += b.data;
00596         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00597     }
00598     return *this;
00599 }

00740 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00741 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator++(int) {
00742     if (Nothrow) {
00743         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00744         try {
00745             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data++);
00746             if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00747             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00748         } catch (std::exception&) {
00749             data.make_nan();
00750         }
00751     } else {
00752         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data++);
00753         if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00754         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00755     }

00828 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00829 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator^=(const
00830     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n)
00831 {
00832     if (Nothrow) {
00833         if (n.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00834         if (!is_nan()) {
00835             try {
00836                 data ^= n.data;
00837                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00838             } catch (std::exception&) {
00839                 data.make_nan();
00840             }
00841         }
00842     } else {
00843         data ^= n.data;
00844         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00845     }
00846     return *this;
00847 }
00848 
00857 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00858 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator<<(bitsize_t shift)
00859     const
00860 {
00861     if (Nothrow) {
00862         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00863         try {
00864             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data << shift);
00865             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00866             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00867         } catch (std::exception&) {
00868             return nan();
00869         }
00870     } else {
00871         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data << shift);
00872         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00873         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00874     }
00875 }

00891         try {
00892             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data >> shift);
00893             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00894             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00896             return nan();
00897         }
00898     } else {
00899         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data >> shift);
00900         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00901         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00902     }
00903 }

01116 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01117 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan() {
01118     if (Nothrow) {
01119         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01120         r._data().make_nan();
01121         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01122     } else {
01123         throw exceptions::not_a_number();
01124     }
01125 }

01149 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01150 template <class Type>
01151 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::random_by_size(Type& gen,
01152     bitsize_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
01153     can_be_negative)
01154 {
01155     if (Nothrow) {
01156         try {
01157             return datatype::random_by_size(gen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
01158                 low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
01159         } catch (std::exception&) {
01160             return nan();
01161         }
01162     } else {
01163         return datatype::random_by_size(gen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
01164             low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
01165     }
01166 }

01228 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01229 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE abs(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
01230     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01231         if (n.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01232         try {
01233             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n._data().abs());
01234             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01235             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01236         } catch (std::exception&) {
01237             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01238         }
01239     } else {
01240         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n._data().abs());
01241         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01242         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01243     }
01244 }
01245 
01264 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01265 typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t divide(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE
01266     dividend, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE divisor)
01267 {
01268     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01269         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan()) return typename
01270             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(),
01271                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan());
01272         try {
01273             typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::datatype::divide_t rr =
01274                 detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01275             typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t r(rr.quotient,
01276                 rr.remainder);
01277             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01278         } catch (std::exception&) {
01279             return typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t(
01280                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(), BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan());
01281         }
01282     } else {
01283         typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::datatype::divide_t rr =
01284             detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01285         typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t r(rr.quotient, rr.remainder);
01286         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01287     }
01288 }

01318             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01319         }
01320     } else {
01321         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r = detail::square(n._data());
01322         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01323         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01324     }
01325 }

01335 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01336 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE pow(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, const
01337     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE e)
01338 {
01339     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01340         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01341         try {
01342             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01343             pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01344             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01345             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01346         } catch (std::exception&) {
01347             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01348         }
01349     } else {
01350         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01351         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01352         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01353         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01354     }
01355 }

01441 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01442 std::string to_string(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, size_t base = 10, bool
01443     uppercase = false)
01444 {
01445     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01446         if (n.is_nan()) return detail::nan_text<char>();
01447         try {
01448             return to_string<char>(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01449         } catch (std::exception&) {
01450             return std::string();
01451         }
01452     } else {
01453         return to_string<char>(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01454     }
01455 }

01695 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE mulmod(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, const
01696     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE by, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE modulus)
01697 {
01698     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01699         if (n.is_nan() || by.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return
01700             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01701         try {
01702             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r = mulmod(n._data(), by._data(),
01703                 modulus._data());
01704             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01705             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01706         } catch (std::exception&) {
01707             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01708         }
01709     } else {
01710         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r = mulmod(n._data(), by._data(),
01711             modulus._data());
01712         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01713         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01714     }
01715 }

01863 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01864 int is_prime(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, callback_t callback = no_callback)
01865 {
01866     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01867         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;
01868         try {
01869             return is_prime(n._data(), callback);
01870         } catch (std::exception&) {
01871             return -2;
01872         }
01873     } else {
01874         return is_prime(n._data(), callback);
01875     }
01876 }

01886 
01887 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator<(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01888     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01889 {
01890     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01891         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01892         try {
01893             return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
01894         } catch (std::exception&) {
01895             return false;
01896         }
01897     } else {
01898         return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
01899     }
01900 }
01901 
01902 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator>(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01903     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01904 {
01905     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01906         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01907         try {
01908             return operator>(n1._data(), n2._data());
01909         } catch (std::exception&) {
01910             return false;
01911         }
01912     } else {
01913         return operator>(n1._data(), n2._data());
01914     }
01915 }
01916 
01917 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator<=(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01918     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01919 {
01920     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01921         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01922         try {
01923             return operator<=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01924         } catch (std::exception&) {
01925             return false;
01926         }
01927     } else {
01928         return operator<=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01929     }
01930 }
01931 
01932 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator>=(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01933     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01934 {
01935     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01936         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01937         try {
01938             return operator>=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01939         } catch (std::exception&) {
01940             return false;
01941         }
01942     } else {
01943         return operator>=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01944     }
01945 }
01946 
01947 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator==(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01948     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01949 {
01950     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01951         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01952         try {
01953             return operator==(n1._data(), n2._data());
01954         } catch (std::exception&) {
01955             return false;
01956         }
01957     } else {
01958         return operator==(n1._data(), n2._data());
01959     }
01960 }

01994     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01995 {
01996     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01997         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01998         try {
01999             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n1._data() + n2._data());
02000             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02001         } catch (std::exception&) {
02002             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02003         }
02004     } else {
02005         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n1._data() + n2._data());
02006         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02007     }
02008 }

02216 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02217 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE gcd(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num1, const
02218     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num2)
02219 {
02220     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02221         if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return
02222             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02223         try {
02224             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02225             gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02226             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02227             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02228         } catch (std::exception&) {
02229             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02230         }
02231     } else {
02232         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02233         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02234         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02235         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02236     }
02237 }
02238 
02249 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02250 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE lcm(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num1, const
02251     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num2)
02252 {
02253     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02254         if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return
02255             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02256         try {
02257             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02258             lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02259             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02260             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02261         } catch (std::exception&) {
02262             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02263         }
02264     } else {
02265         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02266         lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02267         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02268         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02269     }

02284 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02285 int compare(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2,
02286     bool ignoresign = false)
02287 {
02288     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02289         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
02290         try {
02291             return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02292         } catch (std::exception&) {
02293             return 2;
02294         }
02295     } else {
02296         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02297     }
02298 }
02299 
02316 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02317 size_t log2(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
02318     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02319         if (n.is_nan()) return 0;
02320         try {
02321             return log2(n._data());
02322         } catch (std::exception&) {
02323             return 0;
02324         }
02325     } else {
02326         return log2(n._data());
02327     }
02328 }

02332 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
02333     template <class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4, typename N> \
02334     rtype op(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
02335         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02336             try { \
02337                 return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
02338             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02339                 return rtype(0); \
02340             } \
02341         } else { \
02342             return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
02343         } \
02344     } \
02345     \
02346     template <typename N, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4> \
02347     rtype op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
02348         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02349             try { \
02350                 return op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
02351             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02352                 return rtype(0); \
02353             } \
02354         } else { \
02355             return op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
02356         } \
02357     }
02358 
02359 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<)
02360 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
02361 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
02362 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
02363 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
02364 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
02365 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)
02366 
02368 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_MATH(op) \
02369     template <class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4, typename N> \
02370     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE op(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
02371         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02372             try { \
02373                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)));\
02374                 if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02375                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02376             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02377                 return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(); \
02378             } \
02379         } else { \
02380             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2))); \
02381             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02382             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02383         } \
02384     } \
02385     \
02386     template <typename N, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4> \
02387     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
02388         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02389             try { \
02390                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2));\
02391                 if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02392                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02393             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02394                 return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(); \
02395             } \
02396         } else { \
02397             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2)); \
02398             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02399             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02400         } \
02401     }

02421 template <typename charT, typename traits, class A0, class A1, class A2, class
02422     A3, class A4> inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>&
02423     operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& out, const
02424     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n)
02425 {
02426     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow && n.is_nan()) return operator<<(out,
02427         detail::nan_text<charT>());
02428     return operator<<(out, n._data());
02429 }
02430 
02431 template <typename charT, typename traits, class A0, class A1, class A2, class
02432     A3, class A4> inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>&
02433     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& in, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE&
02434     n)
02435 {
02436     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02437         std::basic_string<charT> tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
02438         charT nextchar = charT(in.peek());
02439         if (nextchar == tnan[0]) {
02440             // Must be either #NaN# or an error
02441             std::vector<charT> buffer;
02442 
02443             // These are efficient and safe, but MSVC complains about them anyway.
02444             //std::streamsize size = in.readsome(buffer, 5);
02445             //buffer[size]=0;
02446 
02447             // Replacing them with these.
02448             charT p = 0;
02449             for (size_t i = 0; i < tnan.length(); ++i) {
02450                 in >> p;
02451                 buffer.push_back(p);
02452             }
02453             buffer.push_back(0);
02454 
02455             std::basic_string<charT> str(&buffer[0]);
02456             if (str == tnan) n = n.nan();
02457             else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
02458             return in;
02459         }
02460     }
02461     return operator>>(in, n._data());
02462 }
02464 
02465 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02466 inline void swap(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& left, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& right)
02467 {
02468     left._swap(right);
02469 }

02490 #define BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME boost::xint::integer_t<A0, A1, A2, A3, A4>
02491 
02492 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02493 class numeric_limits<BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME> {
02494     public:
02495     static const bool is_specialized;
02496 
02497     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME min BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION()
02498         throw()
02499     {
02500         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits)
02501             return -~(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME());
02502         else return 0;
02503     }
02504     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME max BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION()
02505         throw()
02506     {
02507         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits)
02508             return ~(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME());
02509         else return 0;
02510     }
02511 
02512     static const int digits;
02513     static const int digits10;
02514     static const bool is_signed;
02515     static const bool is_integer;
02516     static const bool is_exact;
02517     static const int radix;
02518     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME epsilon() throw() { return 0; }
02519     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME round_error() throw() { return 0; }
02520 
02521     static const int min_exponent; // N/A
02522     static const int min_exponent10; // N/A
02523     static const int max_exponent; // N/A
02524     static const int max_exponent10; // N/A
02525 
02526     static const bool has_infinity; // N/A
02527     static const bool has_quiet_NaN;
02528     static const bool has_signaling_NaN; // N/A
02529     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm; // N/A
02530     static const bool has_denorm_loss; // N/A
02531 
02532     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME infinity() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
02533     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME quiet_NaN() throw() {
02534         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Nothrow)
02535             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::nan();
02536         else return 0;
02537     }
02538     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
02539     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
02540 
02541     static const bool is_iec559; // N/A
02542     static const bool is_bounded;
02543     static const bool is_modulo;
02544 
02545     static const bool traps; // I assume this means exceptions?
02546     static const bool tinyness_before; // N/A
02547     static const float_round_style round_style; // N/A
02548 };

02555     static_cast<int>(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits);

02560     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits));

02585 
02586 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL

02588 
02589 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02590 const bool numeric_limits<BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME>::has_quiet_NaN =
02591     (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Nothrow ? true : false);
02592
